flawed_nl_solution:
He needs 10*6=<<10*6=60>>60 feet
He loses 20*0.25=<<20*0.25=5>>5 feet each time
So he gets 20-5=<<20-5=10>>10 feet from each piece
That means he needs 60/10=<<60/10=6>>6 pieces of rope
#### 6

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
